lead_paragraph: With the introduction yesterday of Senator McKellar's resolution to repeal the Neutrality Act, there is additional reason to hope that this long-postponed issue will at last be brought squarely before Congress, where it belongs, and disposed of in the right way. Congress itself has already taken a series of steps which go part way toward repeal.
